comment.author: 81602598@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Test Cricket Photographs, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 81602598@N00
comment._content: Something you may wish to follow up, for historical accuracy. Your title says that this photo was taken on 8 December 1932, but Wisden Almanack, the respected cricket reference, says that the match was played between 2 - 7 December 1932. content-aus.cricinfo.com/wisdenalmanack/engine/match/6260...

comment.realname: State Library of New South Wales
comment.author: 29454428@N08
comment._content: Thank you for this information. Hood's dating is usually a filing or newspaper publication date, and often not the date of the event.
comment.authorname: State Library of New South Wales collection
